name: uBlocko n uMatrix for All to Darkness StylesHeets
description:
It's the perfect dark theme for uBlocko and uMatrix on firefox. Darkness for all of them, If you liked uBO and uM, maybe... you will love it.

SCREENSHOTS
/*
uBlock Origin;
uMatrix;
uBO settings;
uM settings;
uM logger;
uBO and uM Popup Panel;
*/

P.S I haven't added the part codes to logger, perhaps uBO or uM would load delay because it. If you don't install uMatrix, you can delete lines (247-451; 551-576) with text editor.
